snippet: The Devils won, 3-1, and inched closer to clinching the No. 6 seed in the Eastern Conference.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat New York Islanders, 3-1; other NHL results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Devils won, 3-1, and inched closer to clinching the No. 6 seed in the Eastern Conference.

headline.main: Devils Top Islanders to Get Closer to No. 6 Seed
headline.print_headline: Devils Top Islanders to Get Closer to No. 6 Seed
